description.translate: A website to connect Peer Supporters to the disabled community

children.text: Terms of use
By viewing and using this site, you agree to the following terms:
Agreement of terms
Welcome to My Life My Voice (the ‘site’), a website hosted and operated by My Life My Voice Charitable Trust (‘we’, ‘our’, MLMV).

These terms apply to the entire contents of the site, to any web feeds produced by the site and to any feedback or submissions provided through the site. By viewing and using the site, you will be deemed to agree to these terms of use.
Disclaimer

MLMV disclaims and excludes all liability for any claim, loss, demand, or damages of any kind whatsoever (including for negligence) arising out of or in connection with the use of either this website or the information, content or materials included on this site or any website we link to.
Continuity of service

MLMV makes no warranty or representation, express or implied, as to continuity of service. It reserves the right to suspend, terminate or otherwise after access to some or all the site’s services at any time without notice.

Other than personal information, which is covered under the privacy policy, any material you transmit or post to the site is considered non-confidential. This includes feedback or submissions you provide.
We do not claim to own copyright material. You do, however, grant MLMV a non-exclusive, royalty-free and irrevocable licence to:
Publish such material in any media and in any format, including:
On this or any other website
In hard copy publications
In email notifications or alerts
In web feeds, and
Sub-license such as material for re-use by others on the same terms as the license you have granted MLMV.
Third-party copyright

If your contributions to this site include material in which copyright or other intellectual property is owned by third party, you warrant that you have the right to use that material and to grant the license referred to in, and on the terms of, the clause above.
Revisions to these terms of use
MLMV may revise these terms of use at any time. Any such revisions take effect when this page is published.
Contact us for more information
Email:
info@mylifemyvoice.org.nz
Privacy
This policy explains how and when My Life My Voice collects personal information, what we do with it and your right to see or change it.
Purpose
The purpose of this privacy policy is to let users of My Life My Voice web site know when we collect personal information and what we do with it.
The policy also covers the domain name management portal and the design system.

We do not use, share, or transfer personal information in connection with the site except as set out in this policy, or as otherwise set out somewhere on the site (including in terms linking to the site).
Terms of use
Collection, storage and use of personal information.
You can use the site without disclosing any personal information

You may choose to disclose personal information to us when you give feedback or in submission (contact) forms. This information can be viewed by site administrators, certain MLMV staff, Peer Supporters and sometimes third-party contractors who administer or work on the site, or who work on special projects with us.
Do not send us sensitive personal information or include any sensitive personal information in submission (contact) forms if you do not want it possibly viewed by any of the above.
Holding of information

If you provide personal information, it is held by MLMV. It may be shared with Peer Supporters if you choose to use this programme, and third-party contractors to the extent necessary for them to administer or work on the site, or to work on special projects with us. Email addresses are not made available to the public. Unless required by law, we will not publicise the names or email addresses of individuals who provide feedback to us or who provide us with submission (contact) forms without their consent.
Use of personal information
We will only use personal information provided to us for the purpose of:
Administering, evaluating, and improving this site.
Improving our services, and
Communicating with you, including responding to your feedback and information provided in submission (contact) forms.
Making a connection between you and a Connector/Kaitūhono and or a Peer Supporter.
Feedback

Feedback is important and is used to evaluate and improve the site. If you provide feedback by email, that feedback is sent to appropriate MLMV staff or contractor. We may pass on relevant comments to other people within MLMV who administer or contribute content to the site. This could include your email address and other identifying information that you have provided.
Terms of use
Submission (contact) forms

If you provide us with a submission (contact) form, that submission (contact) form will be sent to an appropriate MLMV staff member. We may pass on relevant content from that submission (contact) form to other people within MLMV, Peer Supporters, government agencies, or third parties who administer or are participating in the particular project, or consultation that the submission (contact) form relates to. This could include your email address and any other identifying information.
Statistical information may be collected
We may collect statistical information about your visit to help us improve the site. This information is aggregated and does not identify you personally. It includes:
Your IP address.
The search terms you used.
The pages you visited on our site and the links you clicked on.
The date and time you visited the site
The referring site (if any) from which you clicked through to this site.
Your operating system, for example Windows XP, Max OS X.
The type of web browser you use, such as Internet Explorer, Chrome, or Mozilla Firefox.
Other things like your screen resolution and the language of your browser.
Use of statistical information
The statistical information referred to above can be viewed by site administrators and certain other MLMV staff.
Records and disclosure statement
Your emails and contributions to the site may constitute public records and be retained to the extent required by the Public Records Act 2005.
Correcting your personal information
Your rights
Under the Privacy Act 2020, you have the right to access and ask us to correct any of your personal information provided to MLMV in connection with your use of this site.
Contact us if:
You would like to see or change your personal information MLMV has stored, or
You have any concerns regarding your privacy.
MLMV may require proof of your identity before being able to provide you with any personal information.

The Privacy Officer
My Life My Voice
PO Box 17 166

Karori
Wellington 6147
Phone:

983 417
Email:
info@mylifemyvoice.org.nz
If you have a privacy complaint
If you are not satisfied with our response to any privacy-related concern you may have, you can contact the
Privacy Commissioner
